ground_truth: Inside, he crosses a huge marble lobby striped with shadows, then plods up a dark staircase. Later, he stands before double doors marked Mr. Donaldson. As he goes to knock, the clean-cut Donaldson steps out. They enter a wood-paneled room through a door framed in green marble. The wall suggests an octagonal perimeter. They enter a records archive. They stop by a reference desk. The balding Burdensky opens a volume. On the opened historical pages, the circuit light pathways are unchanging. Meanwhile, David and Elise walk together. As they stroll through a park in the early evening, Elise throws her head back and laughs. Now, in the Adjustment Bureau reading room, Richardson finds Harry studying at one of the large tables. Back in the records room. With David and Elise. He runs. He easily stays ahead, running backward. She gut-punches him and runs ahead. She wins. Now ravers dance under bright flashing lights in a warehouse. David and Elise enter. David waves at partygoers. Elise loosens, then removes it. Later at a table, David swigs from a beer bottle. He shakes a guy's hand. As David and Elise talk, their faces close together, David grins. Elise jumps up and down, pumping her hands around his head. The ravers cheer as David dances with Elise. Later, she hugs him. Now they leave the party. Elise watches him with sorrowful eyes. He twitches a tender smile. He glances away, and Elise gently rests a hand on his jacket lapel. As he gives her a sheepish grin, she reaches up to his face and strokes his cheek. Wrapping an arm around his shoulders, she leans forward and presses her lips to his. David returns the kiss, enveloping Elise in his arms. Later, in Elise's bedroom, David runs his fingers through her hair. She rests her hands on his bare back, and he clasps her face as he kisses her passionately. Now he rolls on top of her in bed, his lips still pressed to hers. As they make love, he grips her hand and their fingers intertwine. David nuzzles Elise's chest. She runs a hand up the back of his neck, and he lifts his head briefly. Later, he spoons her as they sleep, his arm draped over her body. A withdrawing view of them reveals a suited man in a fedora, standing at the foot of the bed. With steely eyes, he watches the couple sleep, then turns away. Sunlight seeps between clouds and fills the sky. Elise sleeps alone in bed, the sheets beside her pushed down and rumpled. She jerks awake. Her startled look becomes relieved, and she touches her fingers to her brow. She notices the vacant spot beside her and sits up.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
Within the grand and expansive interior space, he finds himself navigating across a vast marble-floored lobby, beautifully streaked with intricate patterns and shadows cast by the ambient light. After taking in the grandeur of the lobby, he proceeds to trudge up a staircase that is dimly lit and somewhat foreboding. In due course, he arrives before an intimidating pair of double doors, which are prominently labeled with the name Mr. Donaldson. Just as he raises his hand to knock, the impeccably groomed Donaldson unexpectedly steps out from the room. Together, they move forward, side by side, entering a room with richly wood-paneled walls that imbue the space with an air of old-world elegance. The door through which they enter is elegantly framed in green marble, providing a touch of luxurious detail. The walls of the room subtly suggest an octagonal perimeter, gifting it with an unusual and unique shape. As they continue, they enter a meticulously organized records archive, where they come to a pause at a reference desk. The balding Burdensky opens a weighty volume of considerable heft. On these historical pages, the pathways of light circuits remain unchanged and constant, emanating a sense of timelessness. 

Meanwhile, David and Elise are together, enjoying each other's company. As they leisurely stroll through a picturesque park during the early hours of the evening, Elise throws her head back and lets out a joyful, resonant laugh that fills the air. Now situated in the Adjustment Bureau reading room, Richardson takes note of Harry, who is deeply engrossed in study at one of the large, sturdy tables that occupy the space. Back in the records room, the focus shifts once more to David and Elise. David, in a playful display of athleticism, begins to run, deftly maintaining his lead by running backward with ease. Elise, ever playful, delivers a gentle gut-punch before darting ahead with quick, nimble steps. She triumphantly wins the friendly race, a victorious glow lighting up her face. Meanwhile, in a bustling warehouse, ravers are energetically dancing under vibrant, flashing lights, their movements a testament to the lively party atmosphere. David and Elise make their entrance, seamlessly blending into the lively crowd. David waves enthusiastically at the gathered partygoers, while Elise, feeling more at ease, begins to loosen up before finally removing her outer layer. 

Later, while seated at a crowded table filled with lively conversation, David takes a swig from a beer bottle, savoring the moment. He extends his hand to shake warmly with a guy, exuding friendliness. As David and Elise engage in spirited conversation, their faces draw close together, and David breaks into a broad, infectious grin. Elise, filled with excitement and energy, jumps up and down, pumping her hands in the air exuberantly around his head. The ravers around them cheer enthusiastically, caught up in the excitement as David dances joyfully with Elise. Eventually, she pulls him into an affectionate hug. As they decide to leave the lively, bustling party, Elise casts a sorrow-filled gaze in his direction. He returns it with a tender smile, his eyes momentarily glancing away. In a gentle gesture, Elise rests her hand softly on the lapel of his jacket. He responds with a sheepish grin as she lovingly reaches up to his face, tenderly stroking his cheek with her fingers. With an arm wrapped affectionately around his shoulders, she leans forward, pressing her lips softly and lovingly to his. David reciprocates the kiss, enveloping Elise in his arms with a warm embrace.

Later, in the privacy of Elise's intimate bedroom, David tenderly runs his fingers through her hair. She rests her hands lovingly on his bare back, and he clasps her face with affection as he kisses her passionately. In an intimate moment, he rolls on top of her in bed, his lips still firmly pressed to hers. As they make love, he grips her hand, their fingers intertwining tightly, symbolizing their deep connection. David gently nuzzles Elise's chest, while she soothingly runs a hand up the back of his neck, briefly lifting his head. Later, as they drift into peaceful slumber, he spoons her lovingly, his arm draped protectively over her body. From a withdrawing perspective, a suited man wearing a fedora stands ominously at the foot of their bed. With steely eyes, he observes the sleeping couple, then silently turns away. As the new day dawns, sunlight begins to seep through the clouds, gradually filling the sky with a warm glow. Elise sleeps alone in bed, the sheets beside her pushed down and left rumpled from the night before. She suddenly jerks awake, her initially startled expression transforming into one of relief, and she lightly touches her fingers to her brow. Noticing the vacant spot beside her, she sits up, deep in thought, pondering the events of the night.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Inside the building, he navigates through a vast marble lobby, where shadows cast dark stripes across the polished floor. With deliberate steps, he approaches a dimly lit staircase and begins to ascend, taking each step slowly and heavily. Eventually, he finds himself standing in front of imposing double doors, clearly labeled with the name Mr. Donaldson. Just as he raises his hand to knock, the door swings open, revealing the clean-cut figure of Donaldson stepping out. Together, they enter a wood-paneled room, its entrance framed elegantly with green marble. The room's walls, angled in a way that suggests an octagonal shape, guide them into a records archive filled with historical treasures. They stop in front of a reference desk, where the balding Burdensky is already present, flipping open a large volume. As the historical pages lie open, the circuit light pathways seem to remain unchanged and timeless. Meanwhile, David and Elise enjoy a leisurely walk, moving side by side through a park in the soothing ambiance of the early evening. As they stroll, Elise suddenly tilts her head back and releases a carefree laugh. At the Adjustment Bureau reading room, Richardson discovers Harry engrossed in study at one of the grand tables, surrounded by numerous documents. Back again in the records room with David and Elise, a sudden burst of energy propels David into a run, his movements fluid and swift as he easily keeps ahead, even managing to run backward at times. Elise, filled with playful determination, delivers a light jab to his gut before sprinting ahead, ultimately outpacing him and securing her victory. As they share this playful competition, their surroundings shift to a vibrant warehouse where ravers move energetically to the rhythm under a canopy of bright, flashing lights. David and Elise make their entrance, blending seamlessly with the lively atmosphere as David waves a friendly hand at fellow partygoers. Elise, caught up in the moment, casually loosens an article of clothing before completely removing it, embracing the liberation of the night. Seated later at a table, David lifts a beer bottle to his lips, taking a hearty swig, and exchanges a friendly handshake with a nearby guy. The conversation between David and Elise unfolds, their faces drawing near in intimacy, prompting a wide grin from David. Elise, overwhelmed with excitement, suddenly jumps up and down, enthusiastically pumping her hands around David's head, eliciting cheers from the crowd of ravers as David joins Elise in dance. As the evening progresses, Elise wraps her arms around David, pulling him into a heartfelt embrace. As the time to leave the party approaches, Elise casts a sorrowful gaze in David's direction. In response, he offers a tender, twitching smile. When he momentarily diverts his eyes, Elise gently places a hand on his jacket lapel. As he sheepishly grins at her, Elise's hand reaches up, softly tracing his cheek. Her arm then encircles his shoulders, drawing him closer as she leans in to press her lips against his. David reciprocates the affectionate gesture, fully enveloping Elise in his embrace. Later, in the privacy of Elise's bedroom, David tenderly runs his fingers through her hair, while Elise's hands rest warmly on his bare back. With intensity, he clasps her face, delivering a passionate kiss. Rolling on top of her, he maintains the intimate connection, their lips intertwined. As they make love, his grip tightens around her hand, their fingers naturally entwining. David gently nuzzles against Elise's chest, and she lovingly trails her fingers up the back of his neck as he briefly lifts his head. With the passage of time, they lay spooning, David's arm protectively draped over Elise's sleeping form. As the scene pans out, a suited man in a fedora stands at the foot of the bed, observing them with steely resolve before eventually turning away. Morning breaks, with sunlight piercing through the clouds, illuminating the sky. Elise remains asleep in bed, the sheets beside her disheveled and pushed aside, indicating recent absence. With an abrupt start, she awakens, her initial alarm giving way to relief as she reaches up to touch her brow. Noticing the empty space beside her, she sits up, her face a mix of emotions as she contemplates the vacant spot.

test_cases.description: Inside a grand hotel, he crosses a huge marble lobby, the floors gleaming under the interplay of light and shadows cast by the late afternoon sun, then plods up a dark staircase, each step echoing in the cavernous space. Later, he stands before double doors marked Mr. Donaldson, the nameplate polished to a high shine, suggesting the office of a person of importance. As he goes to knock, the clean-cut Donaldson, known for his efficiency and no-nonsense attitude, steps out. The wall suggests an octagonal perimeter, a design choice reflecting architectural trends that emphasize symmetry. They enter a records archive, the air filled with the musty scent of old paper. They stop by a reference desk, cluttered with documents detailing decades of history. The balding Burdensky, an archivist well-versed in historical records, opens a volume. On the opened historical pages, the circuit light pathways are unchanging, detailed diagrams enduring through time. Meanwhile, in Central Park, renowned for its sprawling beauty amidst the urban landscape, David and Elise walk together. As they stroll through a park in the early evening, Elise throws her head back and laughs, the sound echoing through the tranquil paths. Now, in the Adjustment Bureau reading room, a place shrouded in mystery with shelves reaching the ceiling, Richardson finds Harry studying at one of the large tables, a deep frown of concentration on his face. Back in the records room with David and Elise, he runs, his feet pounding on the floor. He easily stays ahead, running backward, showing off his agility and confidence. She gut-punches him and runs ahead, surprising him with her strength. She wins, her victory marked by her triumphant laughter. Now ravers dance under bright flashing lights in a warehouse, a popular underground venue known for its vibrant nightlife. David and Elise enter, the pulsing music setting the rhythm for the night. David waves at partygoers, familiar faces in the crowd. Elise loosens her jacket, then removes it, feeling the heat from the gathered crowd. Later at a table, David swigs from a beer bottle, the condensation cool against his hand. He shakes a guy's hand, recognizing an old friend from university. As David and Elise talk, their faces close together, David grins, the connection between them electric. Elise jumps up and down, pumping her hands around his head in excitement. The ravers cheer as David joins Elise on the dance floor, their movements perfectly in sync. Later, she hugs him, their bodies fitting together seamlessly. Now they leave the party, the cool night air a relief after the heat inside. Elise watches him with sorrowful eyes, a hint of something left unspoken. He twitches a tender smile, understanding the complexity of their emotions. He glances away, and Elise gently rests a hand on his jacket lapel, a touch full of meaning. As he gives her a sheepish grin, she reaches up to his face and strokes his cheek, her fingers light and tender. Wrapping an arm around his shoulders, she leans forward and presses her lips to his, a moment suspended in time. David returns the kiss, enveloping Elise in his arms, their embrace warm and secure. Later, in Elise's bedroom, decorated with soft, calming colors, David runs his fingers through her hair, enjoying its silky texture. She rests her hands on his bare back, feeling the warmth of his skin, and he clasps her face as he kisses her passionately, lost in the moment. Now he rolls on top of her in bed, his lips still pressed to hers, their connection palpable. As they make love, he grips her hand and their fingers intertwine, a silent promise between them. David nuzzles Elise's chest, hearing her heartbeat steady under his ear. She runs a hand up the back of his neck, feeling the tension there, and he lifts his head briefly, meeting her gaze. Later, he spoons her as they sleep, his arm draped over her body like a protective shield. A withdrawing view of them reveals a suited man in a fedora, an enigmatic figure from the Adjustment Bureau, standing at the foot of the bed. With steely eyes, he watches the couple sleep, then turns away, his movements silent and deliberate. Sunlight seeps between clouds and fills the sky, heralding the start of a new day. Elise sleeps alone in bed, the sheets beside her pushed down and rumpled, evidence of a night spent in restless dreams. She jerks awake, her heart racing. Her startled look becomes relieved, and she touches her fingers to her brow, feeling the sweat from her nightmares dissipate. She notices the vacant spot beside her and sits up, the morning light highlighting her solitary figure.

In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. Elise jumps up and down pumping her hands around his head. The ravers cheer as David dances with Elise. Later she hugs him. Now they leave the party. Elise watches him with sorrowful eyes. He twitches a tender smile. He glances away and Elise gently rests a hand on his jacket lapel. As he gives her a sheepish grin she reaches up to his face and strokes his cheek. Wrapping an arm around his shoulders. she leans forward and presses her lips to his. David returns the kiss enveloping Elise in his arms. Later in Elise's bedroom David runs his fingers through her hair. She rests her hands on his bare back and he clasps her face as he kisses her passionately. Now he rolls on top of her in bed his lips still pressed to hers. As they make love he grips her hand and their fingers intertwine. David nuzzles Elise's chest. She runs a hand up the back of his neck and he lifts his head briefly. Later he spoons her as they sleep his arm draped over her body. A withdrawing view of them reveals a suited man in a fedora standing at the foot of the bed. With steely eyes he watches the couple sleep then turns away. Sunlight seeps between clouds and fills the sky. Elise sleeps alone in bed. the sheets beside her pushed down and rumpled. She jerks awake. Her startled look becomes relieved and she touches her fingers to her brow. She notices the vacant spot beside her and sits up.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: Inside he crosses a huge marble lobby striped with shadows then plods up a dark staircase. Later he stands before double doors marked Mr Donaldson. As he goes to knock the cleancut Donaldson steps out. They enter a woodpaneled room through a door framed in green marble. The wall suggests an octagonal perimeter. They enter a records archive. They stop by a reference desk. The balding Burdensky opens a volume. On the opened historical pages. the circuit light pathways are unchanging. Meanwhile David and Elise walk together. As they stroll through a park in the early evening Elise throws her head back and laughs. Now in the Adjustment Bureau reading room Richardson finds Harry studying at one of the large tables. Back in the records room With David and Elise. He runs. He easily stays ahead running backward. She gutpunches him and runs ahead. She wins. Now ravers dance under bright flashing lights in a warehouse. David and Elise enter. David waves at partygoers. Elise loosens then removes it. Later at a table David swigs from a beer bottle. He shakes a guy's hand. As David and Elise talk their faces close together. David grins. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Outside, a cat leaps over a tiny wooden fence painted with sunlight, then hops down a bright ladder. Earlier, the cat squats beside a single window named Mr. Smith. As the cat goes to sing, the messy Smith jumps in. They exit a stone-clad hallway through an entrance wrapped in blue obsidian. The ceiling hints at a triangular boundary. They leave a music studio. They pause at a ticket booth. The tall Henderson reads a pamphlet. On the closed futuristic screens, the river ink pathways are changing. Meanwhile, Sarah and Tom hop separately. As they run through a forest in the late morning, Tom tilts his foot forward and cries. Then, in the Chaos Office gallery, Jackson discovers Mike napping under one of the small chairs. Ahead in the music studio. Without Sarah and Tom. She crawls. She barely trails behind, crawling sideways. He face-palms her and crawls behind. He loses. Now jugglers float above dim pulsing stars in a motel. Sarah and Tom exit. Sarah nods at strangers. Tom tightens, then drops it. Earlier at a shelf, Sarah gulps from a water glass. She drops a woman's shoe. As Sarah and Tom fight, their feet far apart, Sarah frowns. Tom lies down and shakes his feet under her chin. The jugglers boo as Sarah lies beside Tom. Earlier, he drops her. Now they enter the office. Tom observes her with happy feet. She waves a lazy head. She gazes back, and Tom stiffly taps a foot on her hat. As she grants him a friendly sneer, he pulls down to her elbow and pats her shoulder. Stumbling a leg around her knees, he crouches backward and slams his eyes onto hers. Sarah dodges the glare, rolling Tom over her knees. Earlier, in Tom's attic, Sarah rubs her toes across his hair. He places his feet on her soft face, and she shoves his hair as he frowns silently. Now she stands beneath him on carpet, her eyes still locked with his. As they dance awkwardly, she slaps his head and their elbows untwine. Sarah tickles Tom's leg. He shoves a foot down the front of her back, and she drops her knee lightly. Later, she pushes him as they snore, her feet tangled above his head. A zooming shift of them shows a mustached woman in a hoodie, sleeping by the side of the sofa. With dreamy eyes, she forgets the pair doze, then coughs softly. Moonlight trickles through leaves and cools the sea. Tom snoozes alone on carpet, the pillows above him tugged up and crumpled. She crawls asleep. Her peaceful grin becomes amused, and she strokes her feet to her chin. He observes the narrow path above him and dozes off.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description:
Inside, he moves through a shadowy marble lobby and climbs a dark staircase, stopping at Mr. Donaldson’s doors. Donaldson, clean-cut, appears, and they enter a wood-paneled records archive. Meanwhile, David and Elise share a joyful park stroll. In the Adjustment Bureau's reading room, Richardson finds Harry studying. Back with David and Elise, she playfully punches him and runs ahead, winning their race.

At a warehouse party, David and Elise dance among ravers. David drinks and greets a friend; they share a close conversation, and Elise jumps joyfully. The ravers cheer their dance. Later, Elise watches David with sorrowful eyes; he smiles tenderly. They kiss passionately, Elise's hand on his jacket, and embrace lovingly. In Elise’s bedroom, they express deep affection, intertwining their hands as they make love. A suited man in a fedora observes them sleeping and departs. Sunlight fills the sky as Elise wakes alone, noticing the rumpled sheets beside her and feeling relief as she touches her brow.
